Row.Text: [LIST] [LI][B]You can use this as a template![/B] [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS][icon:YIELD_GOLD][icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE][icon:YIELD_CULTURE][icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] [LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [B] the associated wonder[/B] [/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Civname's associated Wonder.
